<!--Preliminaries-->
```{r}
install.packages("randomForest")
```

```{r}
require(randomForest)
```
<!--Load Data-->
```{r}
df=read.csv("/home/yichiehweng/python/machineLearning/RandomForest/Cryotherapy/data/Cryotherapy.csv")
```

```{r}
sapply(df, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))
```
```{r}
df$Result_of_Treatment<-as.factor(df$Result_of_Treatment)
```

```{r}
head(df,5)
```
<!--Create train and test data-->
```{r}
smp.size = floor(0.8*nrow(df)) 
```
```{r}
set.seed(555)   
```

```{r}
train.ind = ceiling(0.8*nrow(df))
```

```{r}
train=sample(1:nrow(df),train.ind)
```

```{r}
print(train)
```
<!--Train The Random Forest Classifier-->
```{r}
model=randomForest(Result_of_Treatment~.,data=df,importance=TRUE,proximity=TRUE,ntree=500,subset=train, na.action = na.fail)
```
```{r}
print(model)
```
